om.graph
Class XAxisItem

java.lang.Object
  om.graph.GraphItem
      om.graph.AxisItemBase
          om.graph.XAxisItem

public class XAxisItem
extends AxisItemBase

An X axis. See AxisItemBase for most of the properties and a more detailed explanation.

                            int iExtraOffset)
Description copied from class: AxisItemBase
Paints some text. Use current font/colour in context.

Specified by:
paintAxisText in class AxisItemBase
Parameters:
g2 - Target graphics context
dPoint - Position
sText - Number as string
bRotate - Whether to rotate the number in line with axis
bFlip - Whether to rotate it the other direction from normal
bNumbers - If true, assumes text is numbers (for spacing)
iExtraOffset - Space from axis to use
Returns:
Space from axis used (including offset) to paint this text
